name: ZetaChain
introduce: ZetaChain is the foundational, public blockchain that enables omnichain, generic smart contracts and messaging between any blockchain. ZetaChain envisions and supports a truly fluid, multi-chain crypto ecosystem. These “omnichain” smart contracts can send data and value between connected blockchains, including Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, and eventually, non-smart chains such as Bitcoin and Dogecoin. ZetaChain is built on Cosmos SDK and Tendermint Consensus.
